body: Mauritanian blogger Nasser Weddady writes about his country's own Bouazizi - Yacoub Ould Dahoud, who died yesterday after burning himself in front of the presidential palace in Nouakchott on January 17.
original_body: Mauritanian blogger Nasser Weddady writes about his country's own Bouazizi - Yacoub Ould Dahoud, who died yesterday after burning himself in front of the presidential palace in Nouakchott on January 17.
title: Mauritania: Yacoub Ould Dahoud - A Hero

sentence: Mauritanian blogger Nasser Weddady writes about his country's own Bouazizi - Yacoub Ould Dahoud, who died yesterday after burning himself in front of the presidential palace in Nouakchott on January 17.
